CORRESPONDING_EMAIL_MESSAGE: If your email corresponds to an actual account, you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password
ACCOUNT_CREATED: Your account has been created. Check your email to verify it; otherwise, you will not be able to log in.
PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Password must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a special character.
ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL: Invalid email. Please provide a valid email.
ERROR_INVALID_PASSWORD: Invalid password. It must be at least 8 characters long, include uppercase, lowercase, a number, and a special character.
ERROR_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE: This email is already taken. If it's your account, you can try to
ERROR_GENERAL: An error has occurred. Please retry or contact an administrator.
NAME_CANT_UNDER_4: Name length must be more than 4 characters
NAME_CANT_UPPER_100: Name length must be less than 100 characters
DESC_CANT_UNDER_4: Description length must be more than 4 characters
DESC_CANT_UPPER_100: Description length must be less than 100 characters
USER_ALREADY_READER: This user is already a reader
USER_ALREADY_WRITER: This user is already a writer
